IF(WIN)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/miniweb-win32-20130309)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/Tools/miniweb-win32-20130309.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/miniweb-win32-20130309.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()

	DKSET(MINIWEB ${3RDPARTY}/miniweb-win32-20130309)
ENDIF()
